title: Does good attendance equal good grades?

title_detail.value: Does good attendance equal good grades?

summary: Studies of classroom attendance patterns in undergraduate students have shown that attendance and performance go hand in hand -- attending class is the key to reaping the rewards of academic achievement. However, many of these studies were completed before the explosion of online learning.
